ch0245_80_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
You’re pretty amped up today, huh,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0245_80_mary/0101_0701_02_10:
All right, wanna battle? I’ll definitely win,
though!
ch0245_80_mary/7101_0701_01_10: Hm? I look like I’m havin’ fun?
ch0245_80_mary/7101_0701_02_10: Heh heh. You may be right.
ch0245_80_mary/7101_0701_03_10:
I’m just glad I can battle in this uniform on
Pasio, too!
ch0245_80_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
I want everyone, even here on Pasio,
to know how great Dark-type Pokémon are!
ch0245_80_mary/7102_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’m wearin’ this flashy uniform.
I’ve gotta make sure I stand out, so that
everyone watches my Pokémon battles!
ch0245_80_mary/7103_0701_01_10: Puttin’ on a uniform makes me wanna battle.
ch0245_80_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
Hey, if you’ve got time, you and I should
battle! I’ll show you Spikemuth Gym’s true
strength!
ch0245_80_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
Grimmsnarl has been battling alongside me
since my Galar days.
ch0245_80_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
He’s the best battle partner—always givin’
his all, pickin’ up on my feelings.
ch0245_80_mary/7104_0701_03_10:
The sync pairs on Pasio better watch out,
’cause we’ll crush ’em with our teamwork!
ch0245_80_mary/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you ever miss your hometown,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0245_80_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
I do sometimes. Whenever I’m in a dark,
cramped place, that feeling bubbles up.
ch0245_80_mary/7105_0701_03_10: Reminds me of Spikemuth a little, y’know?
ch0245_80_mary/1701_0701_02_10: Here! This is from me, to help cheer you on!
ch0245_80_mary/1701_0702_01_10:
Don’t worry about givin’ anything back.
Let’s both get stronger together!
ch0245_80_mary/2501_0701_01_10:
This is the uniform I wear at Spikemuth Gym.
What do you think? Pretty cool, right?
ch0245_80_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
If you’re a fan, why not try wearin’ it
yourself?
ch0245_80_mary/2501_0702_01_10:
Got any outfits of your own that amp
you up?
ch0245_80_mary/2501_0702_02_10: For me, this uniform does the trick.
ch0245_80_mary/2501_0702_03_10:
Wearin’ it reminds me I’m representin’
Spikemuth, so I’ve gotta hold my head high!
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0701_01_10: I’ve lots of reasons to hype up Spikemuth.
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0701_02_10: It’s where Big Bro and I grew up...
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0701_03_10:
Plus, it’s got Team Yell, who support me
a lot.
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0702_01_10: Team Yell been causin’ you any trouble?
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0702_02_10:
I’m always warnin’ ’em not to, so I think
you’ll be OK.
ch0245_80_mary/2511_0702_03_10:
But if they ever start gettin’ in your business,
gimme a shout!
ch0245_80_mary/3001_0701_01_10:
Mornin’! Got some fight in you, huh? If you
don’t mind, wanna battle me a bit?
ch0245_80_mary/3003_0701_01_10:
We’ve still got lots to do today! Let me know
if you’re knackered—I’ll cheer you on!
ch0245_80_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
You’ve gotta rest if you wanna battle well!
I’m getting to bed early tonight. You should
too. G’night...
